name: The Ignorance of Hope
description:
You wake up in a dark cold environment, surrounded by the unknown, scared and alone with your older brother nowhere to be found. A mysterious phone rings ahead of you, I wonder who it could be. Friend? or maybe foe? what else lurks in the shadows? Or perhaps could the dark become your comfort?

The game is unfinished at the moment. I am having issues with the scripts and some character model issues but until that is fixed I have provided some screenshots of the level design.
